about_the_game:
Dart the Dog: A High-Speed Bone-Chasing Adventure!

Step into the paws of Dart the Dog in this exhilarating platformer that’s all about speed, momentum, and bone-collecting frenzy!

You are Dart, a spirited and swift dog living in the once peaceful Paw Plains. However, tranquility has been shattered as the land is now littered with bones and menaced by hostile skeletons. The mastermind behind this chaos is the malevolent necromancer, Necron. Your mission? Defeat Necron and restore Paw Plains to its former idyllic state.

Do you have what it takes to save Paw Plains, or will Necron's dark magic prevail?

Features:

Three Action-Packed Levels: Traverse through beautifully crafted levels, each presenting unique challenges and secrets.
Engaging Narrative: Immerse yourself in Dart’s quest to reclaim his home from the clutches of evil.
Unique Power-Ups: Discover three distinct power-ups that enhance your abilities and aid in your journey.
Challenging Enemies: Face off against skeleton enemies that patrol the levels, each requiring strategy and skill to defeat.
Epic Boss Battle: Confront Necron in a thrilling final level that will test all the skills you've mastered.
Join Dart on an adventure full of speed, danger, and excitement. The fate of Paw Plains lies in your paws!

name: Dart The Dog Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A fast-paced platformer built around gaining speed and momentum.
